doc.title: La vida y obra de Emiliano Villafuente
doc.plot: The legend of Emiliano Villafuente resurfaces with the discovery of his old movies in an old pornographic movie theater. He has been labeled as eccentric and controversial; to some people he was an idiot, but to others a genius who had a unique vision of film and creativity. We will take a look at his life and the highlights of his career that created nostalgia, humor and confusion on his critics and followers.
